item.title: Lean ERP
item.description: Lean ERP – Waste Elimination Methodology At ERPtech, we implement ERP systems based on Lean Manufacturing principles. We eliminate waste, optimize flows, and build continuous improvement cultures – all within one integrated system. Waste elimination. We identify and remove 8 types of Muda (overproduction, waiting, transport, overprocessing, inventory, unnecessary movement, defects, unused potential). Continuous improvement (Kaizen). Built-in KPI monitoring mechanisms, bottleneck analysis, and optimization suggestions. Value stream mapping. Mapping processes from raw material to finished product with clear visualization of value added.
